text: Rüsselsheim am Main is the largest city in the district of Groß-Gerau in the state of Hesse in Germany, between Frankfurt and Mainz. It is on the Main river and has about 65,500 inhabitants. The automobile company Opel has its main office in Rüsselsheim. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Groß- Gerau (district)
title: Rüsselsheim am Main
